[DON'T KILL THEM!]

You recall his psychotic tone of voice from the timeline you abandoned. Like a caricature of madness. It is easy to replicate.

*You: DON'T KILL THEM!

*Z: ...

*Z: ...Are you mocking me? Who are you?

[I'm a time traveler]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[I'm a time traveler] dissuade_fail_1
[yourself] dissuade_3
